    • Method Detail

      • stop

        public final void stop()
        Terminates the behavior.

      • backoff

        protected void backoff(long millis)
        This method is called from onExpiry() if the backoff is to be extended.
        Parameters:
        millis - backoff in milliseconds.

      • onExpiry

        public void onExpiry()
        This method is called when the specified backoff period expires. The method may be overridden by a behavior.
